title: Banjo
synopsis: Space Ghost is nurturing a special pet--Banjo the sea monkey. Zorak sabotages the interview with Schooly D by hypnotically controlling Space Ghost's mind. "Weird Al" Yankovic reveals that he can eat his weight in Ding Dongs, but his interview is cut short by Banjo, now a colossal brine shrimp intent on destroying the set.

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Halt! (alarms go off, spotlight shines on Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Aah!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Who goes there?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I, Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (turns off alarm) Sorry, man. Sorry.

transcript.speaker: (Note
transcript.dialogue: subtitles which correspond to the spoken lines are shown in brackets)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, look, I am green with evil. [Moltar, I love you.]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (watching "Banana Splits" on monitor) Huh? [I love you too, Zorak.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I said, did your mail order come in yet? [We should get married.]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. [Papa would never allow it.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What'd you get? [But we're in love... why not?]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Soap. [You know why.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hmm. What kind? [It's because I'm an insect, isn't it?]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (holding up bar) Lava. [Papa says...]It's got pumice. [... insects are bad folk.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. [I don't play fiddle.]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: That your new book? [I know, Honey, that's why I love you so.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What? [What?]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Is that your new book? [I said, I love you so.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Shut up, I'm reading my new book. [- Woe is me, for we cannot marry.]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Sorry. [- I am ashamed.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Huh? [- Do not be.]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I said, you can't read. [Let us elope in the night.]

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah. [Yes!!]Where's the Ghost? [You would do that for me?]

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: In the back, with his new Sea Monkey Kit. [No! Are you kidding! I will never marry the likes of mantis! You are a filthy beast! Get ye gone!]

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: "Now you've created an adorable home for your Sea Monkeys... open the pouch labeled "Sea Monkey Pellets" (rip!) and pour into the bowl (pouring sound), in just minutes your little Sea Monkeys will flourish with life!"

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (on the control room monitor) Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona ah-ah. (his eyes flash, show spirals, etc., whenever he says this)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What is that?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's a spell from my new book, "The Joy of Incantations". Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona ah-ah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What's it do?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It gives me power over Space Ghost's mind. Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona ah-ah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's a small spell.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He's got a small brain. Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (still in laboratory) "Soon you will be able to observe your Sea Monkeys as they make families, have dinner, purchase fine autos and perform other daily life activities all within the domain of the Sea Monkey bowl..." Wow!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) Time to get Space Ghost. Think I'll use my NASA voice. "Ten seconds to air, return to the set... T minus 10 seconds and counting... 10... 9... 7... 6... 9..."

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I have to go, Sea Monkeys. Here, have one of my special super vitamins. (splash!) (fizzing sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings! I'm Space Ghost! Joining me on this show, rap artist Schooly D and funny man "Weird Al" Yankovic! Say hi to the band, they're right over there. (points)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, what's wrong with your eyes?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona ah-ah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhh! I see what you're doing. No no no, if you want to control my mind your eyes need to spin counter-clockwise! (he says a short incantation; Zorak's eyes immediately spin the other direction)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh! (calypso music in background) Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona ah-ah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk) Alrighty! My first guest is Schooly D! (Monitor lowers)

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: I kinda figured that out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hi Schooly, how are ya?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: What's up man? I'm alright, I'm alright. How you doin?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Fine fine fine. Say, where'd you get the ball cap, son?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I got it from the planet Zurf.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You don't say! Citizen Schooly,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (reads with difficulty) Original-Gangster-in-the-house...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: ... ah-ah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (makes gibbering sounds, eyes glow, as he falls under Zorak's power)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Say something stupid.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You wanna watch me swallow a live mollusk?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I mean, tell me about your slacks.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) These are baggy jeans, you buy them three sizes bigger so they can hang off your butt.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I saw a yard gnome once, it didn't scare me.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Schooly... Schooly...

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, man?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Are you interested in frolicking in a leafy glade?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, even if I was, I couldn't...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bursts out laughing for no reason) My mantis is dashing in a tux! Will you please pass me one of those wall decorations? My, they look lovely. (makes gibbering sounds again)

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Lombaak ecree oplom ah-plee ozona... no!!!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sniff sniff) Smells like chicken in here.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh... eww...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do you have any super powers?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, of course I got super powers because I'm Schooly D.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Display them!

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: I can't do that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why not?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: I'm just not allowed to do it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So you mean you don't have any.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So the D stands for "Defenseless."

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Nah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So what does the D stand for, Mr. Rapper?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: It might mean Dynamite.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Or it might mean something pretty, like Dandelion.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: The D stands for, somethin' different every day.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: D is for Different, and Delightful (I'm sure getting some sissy copy, aren't I?) Sing something delightful, you know, with flowers and stuff.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Every time I sing something about flowers I lose some of my powers.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You don't have any powers, you need me in your posy.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Posse!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Like I said, posse!

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I can't do that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well then, give me a rap name.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: DJ Space G.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Fly!

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: (buzzing sound) Yeah well, you know...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (SMACK!) (squashes the fly on his desk) Dead fly.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (My sea monkeys!) Uh, just a minute, Schooly. (flies off to laboratory)

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Alright. It's cool.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in laboratory) Sea monkeys? Sea monkeys? Wait! there's one, yes! It's moving! (newborn baby sounds) Hello little one. I shall name you Banjo. You are mighty small, little Banjo, and your flippers are tired, but one day you will become (reverb effect) Banjo: King of the Sea Monkeys!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) Schooly.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost is tending his brine shrimp, can you wait?

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: No. That don't get it. I'm sorry, no.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, can we break your legs?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Break 'em! Break 'em!

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) This is crazy.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It'll only hurt once.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (flies back to desk) Oh-kay! Schooly, you're the man.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Nah, you da man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, you're the man.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: You da man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, you're the man.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: You da man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You are the man.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I am the man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, you're the mantis! Schooly's the man!

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: You are the man. You're Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're the man Schooly, live with it.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: Okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We're out of time, leave us with words to live by.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: (violin music in background) No matter how hard it seems, uh, you gotta keep going and you gotta keep trying, because as soon as you give up, the game is over with. (music ends)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (stares)

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: What are y'all lookin at?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Your hat.

transcript.speaker: Schooly D
transcript.dialogue: You're lookin at me like I was crazy.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Your hat's on backwards.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure is.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: We shall return... with a vengeance!
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ready or not, here we come!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in laboratory) Okay... I'm all alone... Banjo? Oh, Banjo! My, how you've grown! (singing "Flipper") I'm Banjo! Banjo! Faster than light-ning! (crunch!) Ow! You could have taken my hand off! Bad Banjo! I'm not cleaning that up!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My next guest is "Weird Al" Yankovic, here he comes now!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Hi, people of the universe! Hi! Look at me, I'm on TV! Whoooooooo! Whoooooooo! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (imitates) Whoooooooo! Whooooooooo!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Ahh! Ahhhaa!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whoooooooo! Welcome to the show, Weird Al. Whoooooooo!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Thank you! I, I, uh, I can't tell you what a intense thrill it is to be on your show, I...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure you could!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Well, I could tell you, but then I'd have to kill you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Tell him now! Tell him!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Hey Zorak, you...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Shut up!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oooooh.

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: (frustrated) I don't know how!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey Al, tell us about your new record.

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Oh please, Space Ghost, um, I, I came on your show because I'm a, I'm a big fan, not to plug my latest album...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wrong! Next question! Super powers, got any?

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Well, um, I can eat my own weight in Ding Dongs. I can turn red traffic lights green just by staring at them, and I can do an oil painting with my butt.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's enough to get you on this show.

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, times are a little hard, I guess.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, what'd you think of Schooly?

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: He's, he's a party animal, he's, he's, he's a nut, he's completely out of control, he's, he's a party in a can, he's a wacky, zany, nutty funster.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak's wacky. Ain't he?

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Sure, um. Hey, Zorak, you evil locust!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Mantis!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: My powers are beyond your comprehension.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (eyes spinning) Do a B flat.

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Baaaaaaaaa! (does a really high B flat).

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (joins in, slightly off key, trying several times) Baaaaaaaaaaaa! Aaaaaaaaaa! Aaaaaaaaaaa!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Now, contort your body.

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Okay. (contorts his body.)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Baaaaaaaa.. what does that feel like?

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Well, it's kinda painful and it kinda feels good at the same time.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You mean like when your enemy is shaving your back and...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (shivering) Oh-h-h-h-h-h!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: (still contorted) Can you help me here, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Can you help me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, yeah, yeah. (says "spell" again; Al un-contorts) You know, that reminds me of a story... a story about a little pellet who, with a little grit and a lot of sheer will, became a Sea Monkey...

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Also he shot a man in Reno just to watch him die.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) And you know, Al, that little Sea Monkey is named Banjo.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Here, Banjo! (Banjo appears on the set, he is monstrous)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Banjo!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Here, shrimp.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aren't you plucky! Finding your way to the set...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh oh. (gets blasted)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Jumpin' jujubes!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Man, that's a big shrimp!

transcript.speaker: Weird Al Yankovic
transcript.dialogue: Gotta go now! (waves, ducks out of his chair and leaves)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, Banjo! Why are you doing this? I gave you life!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: No!! (gets blasted again by Banjo)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What have I unleashed! (in a low voice) That's it boy. Come get some.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why do we always hurt the ones we love? Why Banjo? Why?! Banjo! Banjo! Banjooooo!

transcript.speaker: Floor Director
transcript.dialogue: Okay, that's a wrap! Break it down boys! Somebody get a hose!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't you dare!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Are you gonna eat that?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sullen) That's a sick joke, Moltar, even for you. I thought you guys were my friends. I have to get out of here. (zaps off)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (crunch!) Mmmmmmmm! Barbecued shrimp!
